name: Blood on the Altar
text:
[skull]: -1 for each location in play with no encounter card underneath it (max -4).
[cultist]: -2. If you fail, add 1 clue from the token pool to your location.
[tablet]: -2. If you are in the Hidden Chamber, reveal another token.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, place 1 doom on the current agenda.
back_text:
[skull]: -1 for each location in play with no encounter card underneath it.
[cultist]: -4. If you fail, add 1 clue from the token pool to your location.
[tablet]: -3. Reveal another token.
[elder_thing]: -3. Place 1 doom on the current agenda.

flavor: Your welcome in Dunwich has been cold. A string of disappearances has left the already Powściągliwy townsfolk on edge. Most of them look at you with distrust, and few are willing to help in your investigation. Who knows what will happen if you don’t find the location of the missing townsfolk soon...
name: Strange Disappearances
back_flavor: Whippoorwills gather along the gambrel roofs of Dunwich and begin to shriek in jubilation. The people of Dunwich believe that the presence of whippoorwills foreshadows somebody’s imminent death. Do they long for your death? Or is the victim someone else?
back_text: If there are 3 or more potential sacrifices, choose one of them at random and place it underneath the agenda deck, without looking at it.

flavor: As the sun sets, the frightened townsfolk retreat into their homes and lock their doors. It is clear to you that many of them know more than they are letting on. A sickening feeling turns over in your stomach as the village’s true nature becomes clear.
name: The Old Ones Hunger
back_flavor: More whippoorwills flock to Dunwich village as the night progresses. The other townsfolk, notoriously superstitious, are terrified by the birds’ presence. With the doors around you shut and locked, you find yourself alone in the streets of Dunwich.
back_text: If there are 2 or more potential sacrifices, choose one of them at random and place it underneath the agenda deck, without looking at it.

flavor: The rhythmic screeching of the whippoorwills fills the night. If the superstitions of Dunwich are correct, their Pieśń portends impending death... But for whom?
name: Feed the Beast
back_flavor: The whippoorwills that have been cawing through the night scatter in unison, as if they are somehow satisfied with the turn of events.

flavor: The disappearances in town may be related to the events in Arkham. You suspect that something awful is afoot. You must find where the missing townsfolk are being held in order to unveil this conspiracy.
name: Searching for Answers
text: Cel - When an investigator enters The Hidden Chamber, advance.
back_flavor: You find your way into the hidden chamber where you believe the missing folk are being held, but the horrors that confront you there fray the edges of your sanity. Bound by chains in a secluded corner of the room is an unspeakable Stworzenie with the face of a man. It wheezes and wrestles to free itself as it notices your entrance. The many mouths covering the Stworzenie’s Ciało are covered in blood and gristles of meat, as though it were feeding recently.
back_text:
Reveal each unrevealed location. 
Move all clues in play (including those on each investigator) to The Hidden Chamber.
Spawn the set-aside Silas Bishop enemy in The Hidden Chamber.

flavor: The pitiful beast lunges to grab you with slimy arms, its many jaws snapping in hunger. Killing it would be merciful. But perhaps there is something else to discover about this Stworzenie…
name: The Chamber of the Beast
text: Cel - If Silas Bishop is defeated: (→R1) Objective - If there are no clues in the Hidden Chamber, advance.
back_flavor: Despite the danger, you brave the beast's horrifying presence and investigate further before killing it. What you find confirms your worst suspicions. Several journal entries written by a "Seth Bishop" describe the process of feeding the Stworzenie in horrifying detail - tomatoes at first, then small game, then cattle, and then finally 'Humanoid sacrifices'. But the most disturbing part is that Seth calls the Stworzenie by name: 'Silas.'
back_text: If The Necronomicon is in play: (→R2) Otherwise: (→R3)

flavor:
...the sparsely scattered houses wear a surprisingly uniform aspect of age, squalor, and dilapidation.
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"
name: Village Commons
text: [action] Rezygnacja. "This is suicide! We're better off hiding out the night."
back_flavor:
...it is Trudny to prevent the impression of a faint, malign odour about the village street, as of the massed mould and decay of centuries.
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Bishop's Brook
text:
Each enemy at Bishop's Brook deals +1 horror while it is attacking.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Bishop's Brook. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
One dreads to trust the tenebrous tunnel of the bridge, yet there is no way to avoid it.
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Bishop's Brook
text:
If there is an investigator at Bishop's Brook, other investigators cannot enter Bishop's Brook.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Bishop's Brook. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
One dreads to trust the tenebrous tunnel of the bridge, yet there is no way to avoid it.
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Burned Ruins
text:
Each enemy in the Burned Ruins gets +1 evade.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Burned Ruins. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
It is not reassuring to see, on a closer glance, that most of the houses are deserted and falling to ruin...
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"
flavor:
It is not reassuring to see, on a closer glance, that most of the houses are deserted and falling to ruin...
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Burned Ruins
text:
[reaction] After you fail a skill test while investigating the Burned Ruins: Flip 1 clue token on the Burned Ruins to its doom side.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Burned Ruins. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
It is not reassuring to see, on a closer glance, that most of the houses are deserted and falling to ruin...
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Osborn's General Store
text:
You cannot gain resources while you are in Osborn's General Store.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Osborn's General Store. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
From the air of hushed fright at Osborn’s store they knew something hideous had happened...
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Osborn's General Store
text:
[action]Spend 1 resource: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for an [[Przedmiot]] card and add it to your Ręka. Shuffle your deck.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Osborn's General Store. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
From the air of hushed fright at Osborn’s store they knew something hideous had happened...
–H. P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Congregational Church
text: Wymuszony - After Congregational Church is revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[Humanoid]] enemy and Rozstawienie it at the Village Commons. Shuffle the encounter deck. [free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Congregational Church. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
"I my self did not more than a Fortnight ago catch a very plain Discourse of evill Powers in the Hill behind my House; wherein there were a Rattling and Rolling, Groaning, Screeching, and Hissing, such as no Things of this Earth cou’d raise up..."
–H.P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: Congregational Church
text:
[action] Choose and discard a card from your Ręka: Gain 2 resources.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Congregational Church. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor:
"I my self did not more than a Fortnight ago catch a very plain Discourse of evill Powers in the Hill behind my House; wherein there were a Rattling and Rolling, Groaning, Screeching, and Hissing, such as no Things of this Earth cou’d raise up..."
–H.P. Lovecraft, "The Dunwich Horror"

name: House in the Reeds
text:
While you are in the House in the Reeds, you cannot play events.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath House in the Reeds. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor: Even the locals stay away from this half-sunken hovel.

name: House in the Reeds
text: Wymuszony - After House in the Reeds is revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[Nightgaunt]] enemy and Rozstawienie it in the Village Commons. Shuffle the encounter deck. [free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath House in the Reeds. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor: Even the locals stay away from this half-sunken hovel.

name: Schoolhouse
text:
While you are in the Schoolhouse, you cannot commit skill cards to skill tests.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Schoolhouse. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor: With its crumbling rooftop and rat-infested walls, this is hardly even a house, let alone a schoolhouse.

name: Schoolhouse
text:
You cannot discover clues here except by investigating.
[free] If there are no clues here: Draw the encounter card underneath Schoolhouse. (Group limit once per game).
back_flavor: With its crumbling rooftop and rat-infested walls, this is hardly even a house, let alone a schoolhouse.

name: The Hidden Chamber
text: Odkrycie - Put The Hidden Chamber into play. The Hidden Chamber and the location from which it was drawn are connected to one another. The door to The Hidden Chamber is locked. You cannot enter The Hidden Chamber unless Klucz to the Chamber is attached to The Hidden Chamber.

flavor: Ten zmatowiały srebrny klucz był skrzętnie ukryty. Musi otwierać coś ważnego.
name: Klucz do pomieszczenia
text: Odkrycie - Przejmij kontrolę nad Kluczem do pomieszczenia. [free] Jeśli Ukryte pomieszczenie jest połączone z twoją lokalizacją: dołącz Klucz do pomieszczenia do Ukrytego pomieszczenia.

flavor:
Cóż kroczyło po górach tej kwietniowej nocy, tuż przed świętem Znalezienia Krzyża? Jakaż zgroza zadzierzgnęła wówczas z naszym światem półludzką więź ciała i krwi?
—H. P. Lovecraft, "Zgroza w Dunwich"
name: Silas Bishop
text:
Masywny.
Silas Bishop nie może wykonywać ataków towarzyszących.

flavor:
W jego rodzinie tradycja była -pamiętano w niej o zaśpiewach intonowanych w wielkich kamiennych kręgach, i to niekoniecznie w związku z Wlburem i jego dziadkiem.
–H. P. Lovecraft, "Zgroza w Dunwich"
name: Zebulon Whateley
text:
Dostajesz +1 [willpower].
[reaction]Wyczerp Zebulona Whateleya po tym, jak twój test umiejętności [willpower] z karty podstępu zakończy się sukcesem: dobierz 1 kartę.

flavor:
Earl Sawyer, który pod nieobecność Wilbura doglądał jego konia i krów, nabawił się fatalnego rozstroju nerwów.
-H. P. Lovecraft, "Zgroza w Dunwich"
name: Earl Sawyer
text:
Dostajesz +1 [agility].
[reaction] Wyczerp Earla Sawyera po tym, jak uda ci się wymknąć wrogowi: dobierz 1 kartę.

name: Proszek Ibn Ghaziego
text:
Proszek Ibn Ghaziego wchodzi do gry z umieszczonymi na nim X żetonami wskazówek, gdzie X to liczba postaci, które "przetrwały Dziedzictwo Dunwich" zgodnie z Dziennikiem Kampanii.
[free]: Porusz 1 żeton wskazówki z Proszku Ibn Ghaziego na Wyczerpany Pomiot Yog-Sothotha w twojej lokalizacji.

name: Porwany!
text: Odkrycie - Wykonaj test [willpower] (4) lub [agility] (4). Jeśli test zakończy się porażką, do puli potencjalnych ofiar dodaj kontrolowany przez ciebie atut z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]]Następnie dołącz Porwany! do aktualnej tajemnicy. Jeśli nie masz żadnych atutów z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]], zamiast tego otrzymujesz 2 obrażenia i odrzucasz Porwany! Wymuszony - Talia tajemnic postępuje: wybierz potencjalną ofiarę i umieść ją pod talią tajemnic.

name: Pieśń przewodnika dusz
text: Mroczna fala. Zagrożenie. Odkrycie - Dodaj Pieśń przewodnika dusz do obszaru zagrożenia dowolnego badacza. Wymuszony - Kiedy miałbyś otrzymać 1 lub więcej obrażeń: otrzymujesz 2 dodatkowe obrażenia i odrzucasz Pieśń przewodnika dusz.

name: Dziwne znaki
text: Odkrycie - Wykonaj test [intellect] (3). Jeśli test zakończy się porażką, dodaj na twoją lokalizację 1 żeton wskazówki z puli żetonów (zamiast tego 2 żetony wskazówek, jeśli w grze jest 3 lub 4 badaczy).

flavor: Robi ci się niedobrze na widok tej krwawej łaźni. Masz szczęście, że to nie ciebie dopadli.
name: Gnijące szczątki
text: Odkrycie - Wykonaj test [willpower] (3). Za każdy punkt, o który test się nie powiódł (porażka), otrzymujesz 1 punkt przerażenia.

name: Sługa Wieloustnego
text: Rozstawienie - Dowolna pusta lokalizacja. Mściwy. [reaction] Po tym, jak pokonasz Sługę Wieloustnego: odkryj 1 wskazówkę w dowolnej lokalizacji.
